commandDescription: List the changes that have occured in an SFDX repository
deployDiffCommand: Deploy only the meta data that has changed between 2 commits from SFDX source into a Sandbox or production
initialCommitDescription: The initial commit that we want to find the diff of
finalCommitDescription: The final commit that we want to find the diff of
includeDeleteDescription: Flag to determine if delete should be included in the deployment, this will generate a destructive change package xml in the metadata deployment
